ABOUT_ME_TEXT: Hello! I'm Jakob, a passionate Developer based in Switzerland. I specialize in Frontend Web Development. With a focus on creativity and detail, I transform ideas into captivating designs.
CHARACERISTICS_TEXT: At home in the Swiss Alps, I'm a 19-year-old with a passion for design, web development, neurology, and music. My hobbies include programming, fencing, skiing, spending quality time with friends, music, and my love for plants.
DIE_TEXT: I'am going to die one day!
WHAT_DRIVES_ME_TEXT: This simple truth fuels my passion. Aware of life's brevity, I'm driven to experience, create, and innovate. Every moment matters, and I'm committed to making the most of my time by embracing challenges and exploring endless possibilities.
SUBJECT: Subject
CONTACT_ME_TEXT: Whether you have a question, need assistance, or just want to chat – feel free to reach out to me. I am available and look forward to hearing from you. Ideas, questions, and suggestions are always welcome. Talk to you soon!
FOOTER_TEXT: Made by me with ReactJS and much ♥
